verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H1945"\w* thee \w that|strong="H3808"\w* spoilest, shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thou thyself also \w be|strong="H3808"\w* spoiled? \w and|strong="H0859"\w* thou \w that|strong="H3808"\w* despisest, shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thyself also \w be|strong="H3808"\w* despised? when thou shalt \w have|strong="H0859"\w* made \w an|strong="H8552"\w* \w end|strong="H8552"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* spoiling, thou shalt \w be|strong="H3808"\w* spoiled: when being wearied thou shalt \w cease|strong="H5239"\w* \w to|strong="H1945"\w* despise, thou shalt \w be|strong="H3808"\w* despised.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* us: \w for|strong="H6256"\w* we \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w waited|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H6256"\w* thee: \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thou \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.

\w At|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* angel \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fled|strong="H5074"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w at|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w lifting|strong="H7427"\w* up thyself \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w scattered|strong="H5310"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7998"\w* \w your|strong="H0622"\w* \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w* shall be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w* \w as|strong="H0622"\w* \w the|strong="H0622"\w* locusts are \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w*, \w as|strong="H0622"\w* when \w the|strong="H0622"\w* ditches are full \w of|strong="H7998"\w* \w them|strong="H0622"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* magnified, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* Sion \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w faith|strong="H0530"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w times|strong="H6256"\w*: \w riches|strong="H2633"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w they|strong="H2351"\w* \w that|strong="H4751"\w* \w see|strong="H2005"\w* \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* without, \w the|strong="H7965"\w* \w angels|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w shall|strong="H4397"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H4751"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w ways|strong="H0734"\w* \w are|strong="H0582"\w* \w made|strong="H8074"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* passeth \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* road, \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H8074"\w* void, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w regarded|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* hath \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w languished|strong="H0535"\w*: Libanus \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* foul, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Saron \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Basan \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w shaken|strong="H5287"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*, \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* myself.

\w You|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* heat, \w you|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w bring|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*: \w your|strong="H0398"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w as|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w you|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* ashes \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bundle \w of|strong="H0784"\w* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* burnt \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0398"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* \w in|strong="H0784"\w* Sion \w are|strong="H4310"\w* \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w*, \w trembling|strong="H7461"\w* hath \w seized|strong="H0270"\w* \w upon|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* hypocrites. \w Which|strong="H4310"\w* \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w you|strong="H0398"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* \w with|strong="H0398"\w* \w devouring|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*? \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w you|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* \w with|strong="H0398"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* burnings?

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* walketh \w in|strong="H1980"\w* justices, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* speaketh truth, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* casteth \w away|strong="H1980"\w* avarice \w by|strong="H1980"\w* oppression, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* shaketh \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* all \w bribes|strong="H7810"\w*, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* stoppeth \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* lest \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* shutteth \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w may|strong="H5869"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* no \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w on|strong="H7931"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* fortifications \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* highness: \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* are \w sure|strong="H0539"\w*.

\w His|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, \w they|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w off|strong="H4801"\w*.

Thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w meditate|strong="H1897"\w* \w fear|strong="H0367"\w*: \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* learned? \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3820"\w* pondereth \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1897"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* law? \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* teacher \w of|strong="H3820"\w* little ones?

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* shameless \w people|strong="H5971"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H8085"\w* profound \w speech|strong="H8193"\w*: \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* thou canst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* eloquence \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \w in|strong="H8085"\w* whom \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* wisdom.

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* Sion \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* solemnity: thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H4150"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w a|strong="H7200"\w* rich habitation, \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w cannot|strong="H1077"\w* \w be|strong="H5331"\w* \w removed|strong="H5265"\w*: neither \w shall|strong="H4150"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nails thereof \w be|strong="H5331"\w* taken \w away|strong="H5423"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*, neither \w shall|strong="H4150"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* thereof \w be|strong="H5331"\w* \w broken|strong="H5423"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H0518"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w magnificent|strong="H0117"\w*: \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*, very \w broad|strong="H7342"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w spacious|strong="H7342"\w* \w streams|strong="H5104"\w*: \w no|strong="H3808"\w* ship \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w oars|strong="H7885"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* great \w galley|strong="H0590"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lawgiver|strong="H2710"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

Thy tacklings \w are|strong="H1077"\w* loosed, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w they|strong="H1077"\w* shall be \w of|strong="H7998"\w* \w no|strong="H1077"\w* \w strength|strong="H2388"\w*: thy \w mast|strong="H8650"\w* shall be \w in|strong="H2388"\w* such condition, \w that|strong="H0227"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H1077"\w* be able \w to|strong="H7998"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w flag|strong="H8650"\w*. \w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shall \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w* \w of|strong="H7998"\w* much \w prey|strong="H0957"\w* be \w divided|strong="H2505"\w*: \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* shall \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*.

Neither \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* near, \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* am feeble. \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein, \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w from|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w*.
